text: Scale Technology Ltd., also known as Scale, is financial company based in the U.S. In 2019, Cyle Anthony established the Scale quantitative system, which can analyze market data in real time, and automatically execute trading strategies. ==History== Scale was founded in 2016 by Cyle Anthony Moore. In 2019, Scale launched the Scale AI Trading System in Texas, USA. Scale entered the South Asian market in 2023, and the following year it received capital verification approval from regions such as South Asia, the Middle East, and Asia, as well as authorization to establish a branch in Pakistan, South Asia. == References ==
title: Scale Technology
